description.plain:
Dijon Isaiah McFarlane (born June 5, 1990), professionally known as Mustard (FKA DJ Mustard), is an American rapper, record producer and DJ from Los Angeles, California.

While on an episode of Complex’s Everyday Struggle, Mustard revealed that he started as a DJ around the age of 12, however rather than by choice it was because he “was left out of parties, and it was [his] family’s business” and that his “uncle was a big DJ out here  and [him] how to DJ.” Eventually, he moved onto DJ'ing his own parties to high school pep rallies, football games, and basketball games.

body.plain:
Dijon Isaiah McFarlane (born June 5, 1990), professionally known as Mustard (FKA DJ Mustard), is an American rapper, record producer and DJ from Los Angeles, California.

While on an episode of Complex’s Everyday Struggle, Mustard revealed that he started as a DJ around the age of 12, however rather than by choice it was because he “was left out of parties, and it was [his] family’s business” and that his “uncle was a big DJ out here  and [him] how to DJ.” Eventually, he moved onto DJ'ing his own parties to high school pep rallies, football games, and basketball games.

description.plain: On “Baguettes in the Face,” Mustard brings out NAV, Playboi Carti, and A Boogie wit da Hoodie for an energetic banger. On the track, the artists boast about their expensive diamonds and the lavish lifestyles they live.

songs.full_title: Don't Hurt Me by Mustard (Ft. Jeremih & Nicki Minaj)
songs.title: Don’t Hurt Me
songs.title_with_featured: Don't Hurt Me (Ft. Jeremih & Nicki Minaj)

description.plain:
“Don’t Hurt Me” is a sensual, sexual collab between DJ Mustard, Nicki Minaj, and Jeremih. The latter two trade bars about sex, while Mustard provides his signature California sound behind the boards.

The song debuted on TIDAL on June 15, 2016.

https://twitter.com/NICKIMINAJ/status/743210258747711488/photo/1

songs.embed_content: Read “Don't Hurt Me” by Mustard on Genius
